content:
Hamish MacDonald said:

Hello (FHIR) World!

Hi @Hamish MacDonald - good to have you here! I've taken the liberty of using the "New topic" window to break this off from the other thread :-)

I imagine there will be questions about how much you've done so far. Also, your advisor @Tim Blake is here, and some have been wondering if you have a relationship with the Te Mana Raraunga (MƒÅori sovereignty network).
